fields.description: The HTML color code that represents the color of the border line. Can either be of the form #RRGGBB, for example 'FFA500', or a named HTML color, for example 'orange'.
fields.name: Color

fields.description: Indicates the specific side of the border. The possible values are: EdgeTop, EdgeBottom, EdgeLeft, EdgeRight, InsideVertical, InsideHorizontal, DiagonalDown, DiagonalUp. Read-only.
fields.name: SideIndex

fields.description: Indicates the line style for the border. The possible values are: None, Continuous, Dash, DashDot, DashDotDot, Dot, Double, SlantDashDot.
fields.name: Style

fields.description: The weight of the border around a range. The possible values are: Hairline, Thin, Medium, Thick.
fields.name: Weight
